title: JavaScript
subtitle: Vanilla, jQuery
description: I bring websites to life with JavaScript, adding interactive features and optimizing performance with clean and efficient code.

title: React JS
subtitle: Next.js, Vercel
description: Using React, I craft scalable user interfaces with components, state management, and virtual DOM manipulation for seamless web applications.

title: Node JS
subtitle: Express JS, REST APIs
description: With Node.js, I build fast and scalable backend services, handle asynchronous operations, and create RESTful APIs to power dynamic web applications.

title: SQLite
subtitle: PostgreSQL
description: I use SQLite and PostgreSQL to manage structured data efficiently—leveraging SQLite for lightweight local storage and PostgreSQL for scalable, production-ready relational databases with advanced querying capabilities.

title: Docker
subtitle: DevOps
description: I use Docker to containerize applications, streamline development workflows, and ensure consistent environments from development to deployment.

title: C Make
subtitle: Make, Automation
description: I use CMake to automate the build process in C/C++ projects, generating platform-independent build files and integrating seamlessly with Make for efficient compilation workflows.

title: GitHub Actions
subtitle: CI/CD, Workflow Automation
description: I use GitHub Actions to automate workflows, run tests, build projects, and deploy applications—enabling smooth CI/CD pipelines directly from my repositories.

title: Python
subtitle: Flask, NumPy, Scikit-learn
description: I use Python for web development with Flask, data manipulation with NumPy, and building intelligent models using Scikit-learn—combining versatility and simplicity to create impactful projects.

title: D
subtitle: Systems Programming, Performanceh
description: I explore the D programming language for c-like syntax and system-level development. I also contribute to the D Language Foundation through open-source projects.

title: C++
subtitle: OOP, STL
description: I use C++ for building efficient apps with OOP and STL, while learning DSA to sharpen my problem-solving skills.
